name: Balcones Resources
overview: Balcones Resources, Inc. provides recycling services for offices, commercial print shops, manufacturing and distribution centers, general business, corporate campuses, and retail centers. It involves in recycling of paper, plastic, aluminum cans, and plastic bottles. The company provides document and product destruction services. It also develops alternative fuels from recycled wood, plastics, and recyclables, as well as supplies its fuels to paper mills, lime and cement kilns, power plants, or plants with wood-fired boilers. In addition, the company provides waste stream management solutions, including design, janitorial, waste removal, waste stream and recycling audit, and trash hauling services, as well as offers paper and waste handling equipment, such as balers, compactors, air systems, shredders, conveyor systems, containers, and desk-side receptacles for sale or lease. Balcones Resources, Inc. was formerly known as Balcones Recycling, Inc. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Austin, Texas. It has facilities in Austin and Dallas, Texas; and Little Rock, Arkansas.
